description: These buttery treats have a nutty and zesty taste.
name: Almond Shortbread with Chocolate & Orange Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the butter with the sugar and vanilla until fluffy.
Incrementally add the flour and ground almonds while you are still mixing until combined fully.
Allow the mix to set in the fridge for 30 minutes and pre-heat your oven to 190Â°C.
Remove the dough from the fridge and roll out using a rolling pin.
Cut the dough into your desired shapes which should yield about 10 - 12 pieces and place on some baking paper on a baking tray.
Bake your shortbread in the oven for 16 minutes or until cooked through.
Once cooked, allow to cool while you melt your orange chocolate in the microwave for a few seconds or using a bain marie.
Once cooled, drizzle or dip the shortbread into the chocolate and add some zest on top to garnish.
